resources.string: Setting the time will provide you a notification and will fire everyday within your schedule. You can disable this in app > notification settings.
Local sync means uploading all your local data to the server. This has done automatically every day. Continue?
Cloud sync means replacing all your local data from the server. Continue?
Cheers up! It was never too late to change your life!
You are in the middle of your journey! You can do this!
Your journey is near to success! Keep it up!
Congratulation! You\'ve implemented a Healthy Lifestyle. Keep it up!
number of glass of water you drink
You need at least 8 glass everyday
Nice! you\'ve enough water for today!
Make Sure to turn off your phone. Happy Sleep!
Make sure you have turn off your phone after pressing the button!
You can complete this mission in within 1 hours of your sleep schedule.
Good Job! At least you have daily vitamin D Needs! Keep it up!
Make sure you have receive sunlight exposure or sunbathe this day.
You can complete this mission in within 1 hours of your Sun Exposure schedule.
Sunbathe is best doing in between 10.00 – 15.00, with 5 – 15 Minutes Duration. Sunbathe is not strictly necessary, the important thing is you have receive sunlight exposure.
There are 3 different things we must avoid eating too much : sugar, salt, and saturated fat.

Healtikuy purpose was to help you to achieve your goals, in terms of a Healthy Lifestyle. The developer aspires for this application to facilitate the cultivation of beneficial habits for users. Once the habit has been successfully established, it\'s okay to remove this app.
Freepik, Flaticon, Icons8, Material Icon, for providing a free assets for this app.

To complete the mission, you should follow the description text. In this feature (sleep), you should set the time first and you should click the button to complete the mission if the time is within 1 hours with your schedule.

There are user attributes such as points, coin, and another. Point is the indicator that if you have reach a healthy lifestyle or not, and points is working together with progress bar. Full Progress Bar, means you reach the goals (healthy lifestyle). There\'s also a coin, to purchase an avatar in the store.\nYou can get the points by completing each mission in main feature. And the points is different for each feature. \nFor coin, you can get it in challenges, and when you have reach the goals (you get it per day).

There\'s exactly 5 main feature to help you promotes your health. You aren\'t necessary doing all of that if you dont want to. You can choose what you like. However, if you can do all of that, it\'s good.
Why this app named \'healtikuy\'? It was actually from indonesia jargon and english words, and Kuy just means like \'Lets go!\'. So this app means Healthy + Kuy = Let\'s be healthy!

Your progress will reset every day, and will be recorded in your history. And there\'s a punishment system, that is if you not doing any 1 features in 2 days streak, your point will be reduced by 1000 each day

Everything inside the 5 main feature uses a local database, and never be uploaded to cloud database. That\'s why if you logged out your account or uninstalled it, your main feature will be lost. However, the points, coin, and other thing beside the main feature, will be uploaded to cloud database. Also, if you want your account deleted, just contact the developer that listed in playstore.
You can get your coin by either daily-login or complete challenges. Daily login reward will be doubled in every 3 days, and for the starter is 8 Coin.

Alcohol and smoking are examples of things that we need to avoid. These two factors can have serious long-term effects on your body. It is advisable to avoid them at all costs. And if you have never tried them before, it is best not to experiment with them.
I\'ve never done any of those things
